about.text: Comenius wants to make students' lives easier. So we created a place with ALL school stuff (e.g. timetable). And the best part: nothing costs! Not for the school and not for the student. Sounds good, doesn't it?
about.comment: Pssst: btw. Comenius comes from John Amos Comenius ;)

shoulduse.a: Well, we try to make your day easier and create a better school-life balance. Your health is important for everything!

howworks.a: We have many exercises for you, a timetable, a homework sorter and many more features. With these things, you can train your skills and make a good school-life balance!

howtouse.a: Currently we're developing all the features. It may take a while until we are ready :(

age.a: No, you can use it if you're a student! No matter how old you are.
